channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Microsoft 365 Certification control spotlight: Network security controls】Microsoft 365 认证控制焦点：网络安全控制
item.description: 【Learn how Microsoft 365 Certification verifies network security controls are in place for your application.】了解 Microsoft 365 认证如何验证您的应用程序的网络安全控制是否到位。

item.title: 【Performance Improvements in .NET 9】.NET 9 中的性能改进
item.description: 【Take an in-depth tour through hundreds of performance improvements in .NET 9.】深入了解 .NET 9 中的数百项性能改进。

item.title: 【Enabling IP Access Control Policy for Azure Portal: A Necessity】为Azure门户启用IP访问控制策略：必要性
item.description: 【Managing IP access control policies is essential for maintaining a secure Azure environment. These policies allow you to restrict access to your resources based on specific IP addresses, adding an extra layer of security to prevent unauthorized access. To avoid disruptions when accessing your Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB or Apache Cassandra API accounts through […]】管理 IP 访问控制策略对于维护安全的 Azure 环境至关重要。这些策略允许您根据特定 IP 地址限制对资源的访问，添加额外的安全层以防止未经授权的访问。为了避免通过 [...] 访问 Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB 或 Apache Cassandra API 帐户时出现中断

item.title: 【Introducing new Ollama Connector for Local Models】推出适用于本地模型的新 Ollama 连接器
item.description: 【Introducing new Ollama Connector for Local Models As a long-awaited feature we are happy to bring a dedicated Ollama Connector. In the core implementation of this connector, we are also using the Ollama Sharp library which allows you to manipulate some native Ollama APIs as well as using it with our connector for breaking glass […]】为本地模型推出新的 Ollama 连接器 作为一项期待已久的功能，我们很高兴推出专用的 Ollama 连接器。在此连接器的核心实现中，我们还使用 Ollama Sharp 库，它允许您操作一些本机 Ollama API，并将其与我们的连接器一起使用来打破玻璃 [...]

item.title: 【Android Asset Packs for .NET & .NET MAUI Android Apps】适用于 .NET 和 .NET MAUI Android 应用程序的 Android 资源包
item.description: 【Introducing a new way to build and deploy Android Asset Packs using .NET for Android and .NET MAUI. If your app has allot of AndroidAsset items this feature will make your life easier.】引入使用 .NET for Android 和 .NET MAUI 构建和部署 Android 资源包的新方法。如果您的应用程序分配了 AndroidAsset 项目，此功能将使您的生活更轻松。

item.title: 【Announcing SharePoint Framework 1.20 release candidate】宣布 SharePoint 框架 1.20 候选版本
item.description: 【We are excited to announce release candidate for the upcoming SharePoint Framework 1.20. This time focus is primarily on the Microsoft Viva platform capabilities.】我们很高兴地宣布即将推出的 SharePoint Framework 1.20 的候选版本。这次的重点主要是 Microsoft Viva 平台功能。

item.title: 【DiskANN for Azure Cosmos DB Now in Open Public Preview!】适用于 Azure Cosmos DB 的 DiskANN 现已开放公共预览版！
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce that the DiskANN vector index is now in open public preview in Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL! This means that anyone who enrolls an Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL resource in the Vector Search Public Preview now automatically gets access to the most powerful and scalable vector index on the planet. […]】我们很高兴地宣布，DiskANN 向量索引现已在适用于 NoSQL 的 Azure Cosmos DB 中提供公开预览版！这意味着任何在矢量搜索公共预览版中注册 Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL 资源的人现在都可以自动访问地球上最强大、可扩展的矢量索引。 […]

item.title: 【Microsoft C++ Team at CppCon 2024】Microsoft C++ 团队参加 CppCon 2024
item.description: 【  As always our team will be at CppCon this year with a host of presentations. Many of us will also be present at our team’s booth in the main hall for the first four days of the conference. Come say hi and let us know if you have any questions about our talks, products, […]】 与往常一样，我们的团队今年将在 CppCon 上进行大量演讲。在会议的前四天，我们中的许多人也将出现在主厅我们团队的展位上。如果您对我们的演讲、产品、[...]有任何疑问，请来打个招呼，告诉我们。

item.title: 【How can I tell whether two programs will share drive letter mappings?】如何判断两个程序是否共享驱动器号映射？
item.description: 【You can compare the authentication IDs.】您可以比较身份验证 ID。

item.title: 【What’s New in Visual Studio Build Insights 17.12】Visual Studio Build Insights 17.12 中的新增功能
item.description: 【We are excited to announce the latest Visual Studio 2022 17.12 Build Insights features. These updates provide developers with greater control and accuracy when diagnosing and optimizing C++ builds directly within Visual Studio. Download Visual Studio 2022 17.12 Preview We extend our thanks to the developer community, particularly our game studio partners, for providing invaluable […]】我们很高兴地宣布最新的 Visual Studio 2022 17.12 Build Insights 功能。这些更新为开发人员直接在 Visual Studio 中诊断和优化 C++ 构建提供了更好的控制和准确性。下载 Visual Studio 2022 17.12 预览版我们向开发者社区，特别是我们的游戏工作室合作伙伴表示感谢，感谢他们提供了宝贵的[...]
